product_overview: A comprehensive real-time chat and collaboration platform integrating secure user authentication, server and channel management, multimedia communication, and AI-powered assistance to enhance user interaction and productivity.
core_goals: Provide robust and secure user authentication including 2FA.
Enable flexible creation and management of servers, categories, and various channel types with role-based access controls.
Support real-time messaging with features such as file attachments, message editing, deletion, and threading.
Deliver seamless multimedia communication including voice and video calls, and screen sharing capabilities.
Incorporate AI features via Google Gemini API for enhanced user experience and intelligent responses.
Offer advanced search and notification systems to keep users informed and enable easy access to communication history.
Ensure a user-friendly interface with customizable settings including themes and profile management.
key_features: User Signup, login, password reset, and JWT-based session management with Two-Factor Authentication support.
Creation and administration of servers, channels (Text, DM, Group DM), category grouping, member roles, and permission controls.
Socket.IO powered real-time messaging supporting text, attachments, threaded conversations, and message modifications.
Real-time and email notifications for mentions, keywords, and security events like new device logins.
Voice and video calling with group support through WebRTC, including camera and microphone controls, UI overlay for call participants.
Screen sharing features utilizing getDisplayMedia API with start/stop controls and reliable stream distribution.
Profile customization including avatars, status updates, and notification settings with message bookmarking capabilities.
Advanced message and file search with filters by date, user, and channel to quickly retrieve information.
Dark and light mode theming, Do Not Disturb toggle, and window control features for an intuitive and flexible UI experience.
AI-powered assistance integrated using Google Gemini API to enable intelligent chat responses and productivity tools.
user_flow_summary: Users can register, authenticate with 2FA, and manage sessions securely with JWT tokens.
Administrators create and organize servers, categories, and channels, managing member roles and permissions.
Users send and receive real-time messages and files, participate in threaded conversations, and modify messages as needed.
Users receive instant notifications on relevant events, and can configure notification preferences including email alerts.
Participants initiate and conduct voice/video calls and screen sharing sessions with seamless UI controls and permissions.
Users customize their profiles, adjust app settings including themes and notification preferences.
Users search message history and files using advanced filters to efficiently locate content.
AI features assist users by providing intelligent responses and enhancing communication workflows.
validation_criteria: Successful user registration, login, password reset, and Two-Factor Authentication workflows verified through testing.
Accurate creation, modification, and permission enforcement of servers, categories, and channels.
Real-time messaging performance tested for reliability, including message delivery, editing, deletion, and threading.
Clear and timely notifications delivered for mentions, keywords, and security alerts, with email notifications validated.
Voice and video communication sessions established with proper media access, participant handling, and UI feedback.
Screen sharing functions operate smoothly across users with correct stream visibility and control.
User profile updates, settings changes, and bookmarking reflected correctly in the application.
Search functionality returns accurate results matching filters under various conditions.
UI/UX responsiveness and theme toggles function correctly across device types and window states.
AI integration successfully provides relevant assistance without performance degradation or errors.
